name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. James Edward MACON, Appellant

judges: Before EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
JONES, C. J., took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. James Edward MACON, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM.
Motion to Quash denied. Judgment of sentence affirmed.
JONES, C. J., took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Myron H. Deutsch, Philadelphia, for appellant.
F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Asst. Dist. Atty., Chief, Appeals Div., Gaele M. Barthold, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
349 A.2d 912
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. James Edward MACON, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Jan. 29, 1976.
Myron H. Deutsch, Philadelphia, for appellant.
F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Asst. Dist. Atty., Chief, Appeals Div., Gaele M. Barthold, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
